ReticleMode.title: Reticle Mode
ReticleMode.tooltip: Changes whether the dot in the center of the screen is visible. When set to Contextual, the reticle will only appear when using the scout launcher or translator tool.

HelmetTogglingMode.title: Enable Helmet Toggling
HelmetTogglingMode.tooltip: Allows you to take off or put on your helmet by the H key or left thumbstick.

DisableAutoScoutEquipping.title: Disable Automatic Scout Equipping
DisableAutoScoutEquipping.tooltip: Disables the scout launcher being automatically equipped in certain areas.

DisableFreezeTime.title: Don't Freeze Time at a Certain Location
DisableFreezeTime.tooltip: Stops the game from freezing time during dialogue in a location where time may not even exist.

MoreVisibleGhosts.title: More Visible Ghosts
MoreVisibleGhosts.tooltip: Makes ghosts easier to see by making their eyes glow at all times.

ManualTranslatorEquipping.title: Press 'T' Button to Equip Translator
ManualTranslatorEquipping.tooltip: Equip the translator whenever you want by pressing T.

EnableDialogueCancelling.title: Press 'Cancel' Button to Exit Dialogue
EnableDialogueCancelling.tooltip: Makes dialogue boxes from speaking to characters or reading notes disappear immediately if the cancel button is pressed.
